document.full_text: the united states is not heading into a sustained bout of high inflation, a top federal reserve bank official said on wednesday, despite a recent surge in energy and food prices that is sparking fears of 1970s-style price rises.
document.title: fed's williams: u.s. not facing runaway inflation
lines_and_colors: the united states is not heading into a sustained bout of high inflation, a top federal reserve bank official said on wednesday, despite a recent surge in energy and food prices that is sparking fears of 1970s-style price rises.
